allOf.description: Main properties of the assay experiment template

assay_creator.description: Indicates what site is filling out the assay.

uploader.description: Email address for individual uploading files.

allOf.title: Assay Core

allOf.description: Base information about the aquisition and analysis of a quantitative pathology image

autostainer_model.description: Model version of the autostainer instrument.

cell_segmentation_model.description: Model used for cell segmentation in an imaging experiment.

image_analysis_software.description: Source sofware for digital pathology and image analysis.

image_analysis_software_version.description: Source sofware version for digital pathology and image analysis.

positive_cell_detection.description: Model used for postitive cell detection in imaging experiment.

protocol_name.description: Protocol name for which imaging experiment conducted.

slide_scanner_model.description: Model version of the slide scanner instrument.

staining_platform.description: Staining platform used for tissue sample labeling.

allOf.title: Image

allOf.description: Shared schema for experiments involving the use of imaging data

imaging_date.description: Date on which imaging experiment was analyzed.

internal_slide_id.description: Identification number used for internal imaging slide.

protocol_name.description: Protocol name for which imaging experiment conducted.

staining_date.description: Date on which slide staining was processed.

allOf.title: Imaging Data

allOf.description: Common information about an antibody used in a number of immune-oncology assays

antibody.description: Antibody type collected for this study.

cat_num.description: Antibody registry catalog number assigned to antibody sample.

clone.description: Resulting type of antibody clone from primary antibody sample.

company.description: Company from which antibody sample was derived.

lot_num.description: Identification number assigned to the particular quantity or lot of material from manufacturer.

staining_order.description: Order in which samples were stained for procedure.

allOf.title: Antibody

items.description: Data specific to antibody prepration on the multiplex immunoflourescence platform.

amplification_time.description: Length of time required for amplified signal detection.

antigen_retrieval_time.description: Length of time needed for antigen retrieval.

dilutent.description: Dilution agent used for antibody sample.

fluor_dilution.description: Concentration ratio for fluor dilution agent.

fluor_wavelength.description: Wavelength registered for Alexa Fluor processing.

primary_ab_dilution.description: Concentration ratio for primary antibody dilution.

primary_incubation_time.description: Length of time for primary antibody incubation.

items.title: mIF antibody

items.description: A single data record from mIF assay
